title: STAT+: A weakened bill to cut off Chinese biotech firms nears passage, after years of changes
description: WASHINGTON — Congress is poised to pass the Biosecure Act after two years of incremental changes that watered down the bill’s curbs on Chinese biotechs and made the law more…
content: WASHINGTON — Congress is poised to pass the Biosecure Act after two years of incremental changes that watered down the bill’s curbs on Chinese biotechs and made the law more…
